My Journey Through CFS


About CFS

ME and CFS are now reconised illnesses. This has been a very important step to start helping those who are suffering from the condition. Not only is the diagnosis something to be able to hold onto, it enables the patients to start getting support. There is no cure for ME/CFS, but there are recommendations and alternative therapies avalible.


“ME/CFS is a biological illness, not a psychologic disorder. Patients with ME/CFS are neither malingering nor seeking secondary gain. These patients have multiple pathophysiological changes that affect multiple systems” (Centers for Disease Control, 2018).


“ME/CFS is a serious, chronic, complex, and multisystem disease that frequently and dramatically limits the activities of affected patients”(Institute of Medicine, 2015).

Click here to go to the ME Association website.

About Who I Am

This site is about my journey with ME/CFS and I have been struggling for the last 4 years, and have decided to make a change.
